history.proof: intros Q x y z H1 H2 H3. induction H3. apply reducestar0. - hauto lq: on depth: 3use: reduceplus_trans. - sfirstorder depth: 3use: reduceplus_trans.

ctx: intros Q x y z H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: The reference IHRstar was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros Q x y z H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.tactic: apply (reduceplus_trans A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q x H1).
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) x : list (Term A n) H1 : canonical A0 eqA ltM x p : list (Term A n) H2 : reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q x p q : list (Term A n) H : reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p q H0 : irreducible A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q q The term "invA" has type "A -> A" while it is expected to have type "A -> A -> A" (cannot unify "A" and "A -> A").

ctx: intros Q x y z H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) x : list (Term A n) H1 : canonical A0 eqA ltM x p : list (Term A n) H2 : reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q x p q : list (Term A n) H : reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p q H0 : irreducible A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q q Unable to unify "reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p q" with "reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q x q".

original: intros Q x y z H1 H2 H3. induction H3. - auto. - apply IHRstar. apply (reduceplus_trans A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q x H1). apply H.
